title: 181(2)(b) of the Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000 

(Section 181(2)(a)) Order 2024 (Revocation) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development act 2000 (section 181(2)(a)) order 2024 (revocation) order 2024

title: 181(2)(b) of the Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000), hereby
heading: 2. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (Section 181(2)(a)) (No. 2)
text_raw:
2. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (Section 181(2)(a)) (No. 2) 

Order 2024 (S.I. No. 399 of 2024) is revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 November, 2024. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [617] 3
